column4: is it netbook edition better for notebooks than standard ubuntu?
what netbook?
notebook:) thinpad r61
if you have small screen and NOT gma500 accelerator than yes. it is better
it is all as you wish :) someone loves gnome someone kde. start with gnome (ubuntu)
hm :) so ubuntu + manually installed kde is something better kubuntu ?
it is equal
because of intel atom im using crunchbang - ubuntu with openbox
are you happy with crunchbang?
yes. Im very happe. now it is my favourite OS. I was on ubuntu kubuntu and debian.
hm. openbox integrates well with kde-based apps ?
does it offer something like kicker?
i have VLC. it is perfect with openbox
you mean panel ?
it has tint2 panel - very customisable with text configuration file
gnome network-manager applet :)
yes it has a very good dock. tin2 panel for openbox. it is already installed
nice :) crunchang is configured (gnome-net-manager ) ?
everything works out of the box. you just tune it (chose theme etc..). also crunchbang have livecd so you can try it without installation :)
what is the diff between standard/lite ver?
in standard there are more applications. all them usable :)
